text: At a little-known university there was a small professor of body, blond, stuttering, who, as he had no ideas of his own, was highly esteemed in society and had before him a brilliant source in literary criticism. What he read in the books he offered to his disciples the next morning. Such an unprecedented ability to repeat accurately was the desperation of the most accomplished builders of talking machines. And so it was many years before one day, by the force of repeating other people's ideas, our teacher had her own, a little idea of her own, shiny and beautiful like a little red fish behind the iridescent glass of a fish tank. FIN
title: La humildad premiada
author: Julio Torri
